short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get rid off those pesky parts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The "Click and Hide" is a chrome extension, that gives you an extra-button on the context-menu, which you can hide parts of the website in your liking. When you return to any website that has hidden parts the extension keeps them the unwanted hidden by its automatic-systems.
